```{r, echo = F, include = T}

suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))

series <-
  read.csv("../dados/series_log.csv") %>%
  dplyr::select(spread, selic, inad, ihh, pib_mensal)

```

# VECM

```{r, echo = F, include = T}

library(urca); library(vars)

vec <- ca.jo(series, spec = "transitory", type = "eigen", K = 2)
vec %>% summary

vecm <- vec2var(vec, r = 1)
vecm %>% irf(response = "spread", n.ahead = 12, ortho = F) %>% plot

```
